title: Anthony Pompliano
body:
IP Objective: Anthony Pompliano
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 5000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 10000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01  18:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.03    00:00

Anthony Pompliano is one of the more active crypto influencers across a number of platforms, not just on Twitter, where he has more than 930,000 followers. He’s known as one of the pioneer Bitcoin supporters and is a founder and partner at a hedge fund that specializes in blockchain technology and digital assets. 

He also runs a YouTube channel, Anthony Pompliano, where he posts videos on Bitcoin and crypto discussions, podcasts, interviews, and explanations about business, tech, and finance. Pompliano also has a Substack newsletter called The Pomp Letter, which is a daily newsletter that shares his analysis on various industries including finance and tech.
author: 0x9c32555C64879004AC20a2192557eC48a2e4b807
